name: Color Converter
description: Color Converter is an Android app to pick, display and convert colors.  Features:  Pick colors  Get name of picked colors  Display picked colors in different formats (RGB, HEX, HSV)  Generate random colors  Pick color from a photo / image  Save / load colors  Do you want to help us translating the app? Please send an email to contact@chillibits.com.  If you want to support the project financially, please visit https://github.com/sponsors/marcauberer  The app is OpenSource: https://github.com/chillibits/color-converter
